## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deltatree">DeltaTree</a> - a multiway search tree (BTree) structure with some fancy features.

B-Trees are generally more memory and cache efficient than binary trees, because they store multiple keys/values in each node. This implements a key/value mapping from index to delta, and allows fast lookup on index. However, an added (important) bonus is that it can also efficiently tell us the full accumulated delta for a specific file offset as well, without traversing the whole tree.

Definition at line 25 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/deltatree-h">DeltaTree.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### AddDelta() {#a65b2200df7c029fc766e3486c6629ae5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void DeltaTree::AddDelta (unsigned FileIndex, int Delta)">
AddDelta - When a change is made that shifts around the text buffer, this method is used to record that info.

It inserts a delta of &#39;Delta&#39; into the current <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deltatree">DeltaTree</a> at offset FileIndex.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/deltatree-h/#l00045">45</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/deltatree-h">DeltaTree.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/deltatree-cpp/#l00450">450</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/deltatree-cpp">DeltaTree.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getDeltaAt() {#a9d2add1ca152069aa7cd796d3e7c552e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="int DeltaTree::getDeltaAt (unsigned FileIndex) const">
getDeltaAt - Return the accumulated delta at the specified file offset.

This includes all insertions or delections that occurred <em>before</em> the specified file index.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/deltatree-h/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/deltatree-h">DeltaTree.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/deltatree-cpp/#l00402">402</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/deltatree-cpp">DeltaTree.cpp</a>.
